Subject: Rule 412 
Date: Fri, 29 Oct 2021 19:24:32 +0000 
Attachments: Defl_412_Mot.for Glassman Redacted.pdf 
Robert, 
As we discussed this morning, I'm attaching a copy of the Rule 412 motion, which was filed under seal. Our response will 
be filed under seal on Monday. If the Court holds a hearing on the motion, it will be in camera on Friday, November 5, 
2021. 
Thanks, 
Assistant United States Attorney 
Southern District of New York 
One Saint Andrew's Plaza 
New York, NY 10007 
EFTA00016264
